property.name: DefenderBriefing
property.value:
You are under attack by a MYSTERIOUS FORCE!!! An unidentified military detachment has landed in your area, seemingly out of nowhere. Who they are is not clear. An obscure mercenary unit? Pirates perhaps? But how did they avoid being detected until now?

As you assess the situation, it suddenly becomes clear that the strange invaders are converging on your position! You prepare yourself for battle against an unknown enemy...

OPERATION FEATURES:
* Standard Deployment: 83.3% chance combatants will start on opposite sides (16.7% chance of center/edge)

VICTORY CONDITONS (Probing Attack):
* Force opponent to surrender OR trigger auto-victory
* Auto-victory triggered when 1) 25% of enemy BV destroyed, and 2) friendly BV is 110% of enemy BV

BATTLE OUTCOMES:
* Land Exchange (None): No land exchange in this operation
* Intelligence (Standard Defender): +1 Intel, if winner
* Influence (Low Defender): 2000 BV: ~30 flu / 4000 BV: ~50 flu / 6000 BV: ~80 flu
* Operation Pay (MEDIUM): 2000 BV: ~3,264 CBills / 4000 BV: ~5,663 / 6000 BV: ~8,063 CBills
* Loss Penalty: -20% if defeated -- standard loss penalty
* Dishonorable Surrender: ADDITIONAL -20% pay if you surrender before a 20% BV loss
* Salvage (Standard): 40% Friendly/40% Enemy

***END BRIEFING***

property.name: AttackerBriefing
property.value:
You have launched a ROM INQUEST on a planet where The Order is seeking to gather data. Your force of raiders will be landing in a remote area of the planet from which you are to venture forth and gather intelligence. You are to engage whatever forces you might encounter once planeside and determine their capabilities.

The Precentor ROM has issued strict orders, however, to minimize your losses. If you suffer any significant damage (>25% BV loss), you are to stop engaging with the enemy immediately and retreat. (We assess that any opposing force will likely do the same.)

Go forth and be victorious, Adept. May the Blessed Blake favor you.

OPERATION FEATURES:
* Standard Deployment: 83.3% chance combatants will start on opposite sides (16.7% chance of center/edge)

VICTORY CONDITONS (Probing Attack):
* Force opponent to surrender OR trigger auto-victory
* Auto-victory triggered when 1) 25% of enemy BV destroyed, and 2) friendly BV is 110% of enemy BV

BATTLE OUTCOMES:
* Land Exchange (None): No land exchange in this operation
* Intelligence (High): +3 Intel if winner
* Influence (None): No influence for attacker
* Operation Pay (LOW): 2000 BV: ~2,720 CBills / 4000 BV: ~4,720 CBills / 6000 BV: ~6,720 CBills
* Loss Penalty: -20% if defeated -- standard loss penalty
* Dishonorable Surrender: ADDITIONAL -20% pay if you surrender before a 20% BV loss
* Salvage (Standard): 40% Friendly/40% Enemy

***END BRIEFING***
